<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Updating JSON columns in OneAPI invocation tables to string for performance enhancement</description>
        <name>Change OneAPI JSON columns to String</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateColumnType("one_api_service_plan_feature_invocation" , ["raw_input","input","raw_output","output"]);
updateColumnType("one_api_service_plan_invocation" , ["input", "output", "execution_plan"]);

function updateColumnType(tableName, elements) {
	for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
		gr.addQuery("name", tableName);
		gr.addQuery("element", elements[i]);
		gr.query();
		if (gr.next()) {
			gr.setValue("internal_type", "string");
			gr.update();
		}
	}
}]]></script>
